alert.note: Alert for Northern Humboldt Interior; Northern Lake County; Southern Humboldt Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 26 at 2:04PM PDT until October 27 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 expected. * WHERE...Northern Humboldt Interior, Southern Humboldt Interior and Northern Lake Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 AM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Provide adequate shelter for outdoor pets or consider bringing them indoors. Frost Advisories and Freeze Warnings are issued during the local growing season as defined by climatology and local agriculture experts. Once the growing season has ended these statements will no longer be issued until the spring.

area.areaDesc: Northern Humboldt Interior; Northern Lake County; Southern Humboldt Interior
